Articles.Content:
Description: Kerbin has an area of low res texture at a particular range

build id = 00642

2014-10-07_10-59-44

Branch: master

while orbiting Kerbin, i noticed the surface had a circle of different coloured, different quality texture. this was on the closest portion of the planet only and as the camera/craft moved, so did the glitch area (eg rotate, zoom, etc).

- - - Updated - - -

note: This seems to have disappeared after restarting the game.

Weird. I haven't seen this one before. If it happens again, try to save the output_log.txt file.

Cheers,

~Claw
